Luxury yacht skipper loses $400k in scam, faces accused ‘money mule’ in court, says deception ruined his life https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/luxury-yacht-skipper-loses-400k-in-scam-faces-accused-money-mule-in-court-says-deception-ruined-his-life/ X4T223YTSRDIZOAWFQB7JTU64I/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/luxury-yacht-skipper-loses-400k-in-scam-faces-accused-money-mule-in-court-says-deception-ruined-his-life/ X4T223YTSRDIZOAWFQB7JTU64I/ Lane NicholsHe thought he was investing $400k in a HSBC term deposit. But it was all a scam. Sun, 24 Mar 2024 06:32:27 +0000 Far North commercial skipper Tim Michalick lost $400,000 in an investment scam. He is speaking publicly to highlight flaws in the banking system and deficient customer protections. Photo / Jenny Ling
